Author: cipi#4502
Content: ok, i see the problem... when i ask the server about a non existent tx `{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "error": {"code": 2, "message": "daemon error: {'code': -1, 'message': 'JSON value is not an integer as expected'}"}, "id": 1}` is returned instead of the error string "not found"... will play a bit with it, maybe i can "fix" it myself... but it would of course be better if this workaround would not be necessary, since changes in the code can break it
